wikipedia_page.main: Reginald Pugh (12 July 1914 – 21 October 1981) was a Welsh professional footballer.

response: Rickards began his career with Notts County, making over 100 appearances in all competitions for the club. He joined Cardiff City in 1938 as competition for Reg Pugh and played one season at Ninian Park before the put of World War II brought an end to his professional playing career.
